SELECT
FROM smt_order_online a
1=1
and a.customer_no LIKE '%${customerNo}%'
and a.product_no LIKE '%${productNo}%'
and a.order_no LIKE '%${orderNo}%'
and a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}

ORDER BY a.create_date desc

SELECT one.id as "id", one.productType as "productType", one.orderNo AS "orderNo", one.customerNo AS "customerNo", one.customerName AS "customerName", one.productNo AS "productNo", one.counts - IF ( ISNULL( sum( pro.entry_counts ) ), 0, sum( pro.entry_counts) ) AS "counts", one.createDate AS "createDate", one.updateDate AS "updateDate", one.remarks AS "remarks", one.delFlag AS "delFlag" from (SELECT a.id AS "id", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.customer_no AS "customerNo", b.customer_name AS "customerName", a.product_no AS "productNo", a.product_type AS "productType", sum( a.counts ) AS "counts", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM smt_order_online a LEFT JOIN smt_sys_customer b ON a.customer_no = b.customer_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY a.customer_no, a.product_type, a.product_no ) one LEFT JOIN smt_product_entry pro ON one.productNo = pro.product_no AND one.customerNo = pro.customer_no AND pro.del_flag = 0 where 1=1
and one.customerNo LIKE '%${customerNo}%'
and one.productNo LIKE '%${productNo}%'
and one.orderNo LIKE '%${orderNo}%'
and one.id in (${id})
GROUP BY one.customerNo, one.productNo
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY one.updateDate DESC
SELECT send_no FROM smt_order_online where del_flag = 0 ORDER BY send_no desc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO smt_order_online( order_no, send_no, customer_no, product_no, product_type, counts, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{sendNo}, #{customerNo}, #{productNo}, #{productType}, #{counts}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE smt_order_online SET order_no = #{orderNo}, send_no = #{sendNo}, customer_no = #{customerNo}, product_no = #{productNo}, product_type = #{productType}, counts = #{counts}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
